document_data.caption: Various light hammers
document_data.name: Light hammer
document_data.mainbody: A '''light hammer''' was a light, martial melee weapon of the [[hammer]] family that could be used as a ranged weapon.
document_data.Description: The light hammer was a small [[sledge hammer]], usually with a haft made of wood about one and a half feet long (45cm). Other versions of this weapon added a [[pick]] on the back of the hammer head. An average light hammer cost 1gp and weighed 2lbs (0.9kg).
document_data.Weaponology: Classified as a light weapon, the light hammer could be used while grappling. Some training was required to use this weapon, especially for throwing, therefore it was considered a martial weapon. Normal maximum range of a light hammer was 100ft (30m).
document_data.Other Editions: The 1st edition represents the light hammer (called just "hammer") as both a melee and hurled weapon. The 2nd edition presents the "hammer" only as a missile weapon.
